engine that can be used to enforce custom security policies in disparate
systems using a high-level declarative language called as regel and some of the
benefits of OPA if you think about it a single organization can have like thousands of
security components that require authorization each domain vendor and
product has its own authorization paradigm expressiveness an interface or
armistice to control authorization policies so the challenge with achieving or lease privileged authorization is the
